home.title: Hi! I'm Emmanuel
home.description: I've worked for startups in eCommerce and blogging, done interesting freelance work as part of the collective Hello world, and now i currently work on open source projects. I Have worked with very technologies such as AdonisJs(NodeJs), ExpressJs, ReactJS, Laravel, RabbitMq Python. I have Built a couple of fintect applications, educational and ecommerce application.
